title: Bioengineering team's 'circuit' work may benefit gene therapy

title_detail.value: Bioengineering team's 'circuit' work may benefit gene therapy

summary: Researchers have designed genetic 'circuits' out of living cellular material in order to gain a better understanding of how proteins function, with the goal of making improvements.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have designed genetic 'circuits' out of living cellular material in order to gain a better understanding of how proteins function, with the goal of making improvements.
